name: Sleepless City
description:
12/02/23 16:49 GMT Just pushed update 1.02 fixing a couple of non-gamebreaking bugs with the quest log.

12/02/23 15:14 GMT Just pushed update 1.01 with a couple of small QOL fixes.

Controls:

WSAD/Arrows/Left Mouse - Move

Left Mouse Click On Object- Interact

Right Mouse  Button - Rotate Camera

I - Inventory

M - Minimap

On Inventory Screen the Button at the top opens quest log

(I would have added a key bind for this but the feature is WIP in engine and thus not available yet).

---

Sleepless City.

A game made with RPG In A Box for Sloyd Gamejam #2

SUBMISSION FOR MAIN EVENT with Theme Insomnia

Objects made using Sloyd (and then voxelized).

  1. Player and All NPCs: Nanorasmus’ Robot/Humanoid generator
  2. Zeppelin (transport method for player)
  3. Go Kart (turned into a futuristic car design by scaling the wheels)
  4. Bench
  5. Bus Stop
  6. Fountain
  7. Ring (collectible item)
  8. Lantern (held by the player)
  9. Construction Barrier
  10. Street Lights (Both generators, totaling 3 variations)
  11. Watch Tower
  12. Ladder
  13. Billboard
  14. Swings
  15. Signpost
  16. Trees (2 generator variations),
  17. Piano.
  18. Another version of the Go Kart for a somewhat less good condition car type.
  19. Crane.
  20. Tent.
  21. Barrel.
  22. Simple Bed.
  23. I-Beams (repeated to create a certain object).

CREDITS

DESIGN, DEVELOPMENT, ART and MUSIC

BY FATAL EXIT.

FONT BY KENNEY.

SOFTWARE USED...

  • SLOYD.
  • MAGICA VOXEL.
  • RPG IN A BOX.
  • FL STUDIO.
  • AUDACITY.
  • AFFINITY PHOTO V2.

Thank you to the awesome Sloyd Creators, Developers and community, you are all awesome and I love taking part in your jams.
